item.description:
A very special QUIZ FOR A CAUSE for Boston Partners in Education. Basically, people donate $10 each (if they want) and if they win, they get $5 for each team that donated, and the rest goes to the charity. Anyone can still play the quiz without paying, but you won't win the extra cash that way. :D Join us Monday, May 13th, for Geeks Who Drink pub quiz at Battery Park! Last week, Team "Lucic Fight Club" took home second prize.Â  WHOO HOOO!! The quiz starts at 7:00pm - join us and Geeks Who Drink http://geekswhodrink.com/518/ . The quiz consists of 8 rounds of 8 questions and includes a picture round, music round, and chances for FREE BEER!

Battery Park is conveniently located in the Financial District near State Street (Orange and Blue Line), Downtown Crossing (Orange and Red Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red and Green Lines). Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB. You can view Battery Park's menu here: http://www.batteryparkboston.com/.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look at others' meetup pics and try to find. Ask bartender or hostess if you cannot find us.
item.name: *SPECIAL* Pub Quiz with Geeks Who Drink at Battery Park Monday May 13th
